==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=美国}}

===Etymology===
From {{zh-m|美|Měi|note=abbreviation of {{zh-l|亞美利加}}, from {{der|zh|en|America}}}} + {{zh-l|國|nation}}. {{zh-l|美}} also means "beautiful", which inspires false etymology.
